tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Yamuna Narendra  is a very good doctor. We  found her to be very polite,  gentle and  good  listener  which utmost gives  satisfaction for  patient. She  
Went  through the report in detail and  investigate the right  diagnosis and  prescribed only  required medicines for issues related health and  guides the  patient . She has good  nature towards  patients like family  member. I would highly recommend her for happy healthy life.
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** ** *** ***** When i went to her i detected with diabetes the first time and my hba1c was 10.5% to this i was very much scared but she made me comfortable and guided me with necessary changes in my lifestyle which inturn gave outstanding results. I felt so enrgized and my hba1c dropped to 6%. Currently i am not on any medicines and this is the best gift any doctor can give it to his /her patient. Staff over there will give you best. Hospitality experience and clinic is very clean and hygenic . Closing my eyes i will recommend her to all my family members and friends.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My journey with sugarfit has been great so far! The staff at the Indiranagar centre were very helpful and polite, they made me feel welcome and comfortable throughout my visit. 
As for the medical care, Dr.Yamuna is incredibly supportive and attentive. She took the time to listen to my concerns and thoroughly addressed each one, patiently explaining the treatment plan and answering all my questions. I have noticed significant improvement in my HbA1c levels and its all thanks to team sugarfit, Indiranagar.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr Yamuna helped me understand the simple lifestyle changes that I need to follow for my diabetes. Clinic staffs are super friendly and they make sure I am attended without any delay. 

The clinic doesn't give hospital vibes and the doctors and staff are very supportive. Highly recommend if you are diabetic/prediabetic
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My recent visit was excellent. The staff was friendly, and the wait time was minimal. The doctor thoroughly reviewed my treatment plan, answered all my questions, and provided practical advice. I left feeling well-informed and reassured about managing my diabetes. Highly recommend this practice
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.
